description: Minimal stage 3 analysis results for filter function testing - no LLM calls needed

opportunities.title: High Relevance Environmental Grant
opportunities.enhancedDescription: This is a high-relevance opportunity that should be included

opportunities.title: Medium Relevance Infrastructure Loan
opportunities.enhancedDescription: Medium relevance but low funding attractiveness - should be included (only 1 zero)
opportunities.relevanceReasoning: Good client and project match, but funding concerns

opportunities.title: Low Relevance Research Grant
opportunities.enhancedDescription: Low relevance opportunity that should be excluded (2 zeros)
opportunities.relevanceReasoning: Fails on both client and project relevance

opportunities.title: Closed High-Value Grant
opportunities.enhancedDescription: High-value opportunity but deadline has passed - should be excluded (closed)
opportunities.actionableSummary: Excellent match but no longer available
opportunities.relevanceReasoning: Good relevance but opportunity is closed

opportunities.title: Edge Case - One Zero Category
opportunities.enhancedDescription: One zero category - should be included (only 1 zero)
opportunities.actionableSummary: Good client match and funding, but project mismatch
opportunities.relevanceReasoning: Strong client and funding match compensates for project concerns

opportunities.title: Two Zero Categories - Should Exclude
opportunities.enhancedDescription: Two zero categories - should be excluded
opportunities.actionableSummary: Poor client match and insufficient funding
opportunities.relevanceReasoning: Fails on both client relevance and funding attractiveness

opportunities.title: Federal Perfect Match Grant
opportunities.enhancedDescription: Perfect match federal grant - should be included
opportunities.relevanceReasoning: Maximum relevance scores across all criteria

opportunities.title: Federal Medium Match
opportunities.enhancedDescription: Good federal opportunity - should be included (only 0 zeros)
opportunities.relevanceReasoning: Strong funding makes up for moderate relevance

opportunities.title: Federal Research Only - Should Exclude
opportunities.enhancedDescription: Research-only opportunity not suitable for our clients - should be excluded (2 zeros)
opportunities.relevanceReasoning: Fails on both client and project relevance

opportunities.title: Missing Scoring Data
opportunities.enhancedDescription: Opportunity with missing scoring data to test validation - should be excluded
opportunities.actionableSummary: Cannot evaluate due to missing data
opportunities.relevanceReasoning: Unable to score due to missing analysis
